pacman
Class GameObject

java.lang.Object
  pacman.GameObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
Link, Rupee, Stalfos, Wall
public class GameObject
extends java.lang.Object

A base object used in the game. Is implemented by all other objects in the game.

Since:
2013-01-27
Author:
Alex Pennells

Field Summary
 int hPadding
          Specifies the horizontal padding between the edge of the sprite and the actual object within it.

          A reference to the other objects in the game.

Method Summary
 int getBottom()
          Calculates the position of the bottom of the object.

          Calculates the position of the bottom of the object while accounting for padding.

Constructor Detail

GameObject

public GameObject(GameObjects gameObjects,
                  int xPos,
                  int yPos)
Creates a basic game object.

Parameters:
gameObjects - A reference to the other objects in the game.
xPos - The X position to create the object at.
yPos - The Y position to create the object at.
Method Detail

isCollidingWith

public boolean isCollidingWith(GameObject other)
Checks whether the object's positions overlap, causing a collision.

Parameters:
other - The object to check for a collision with.
Returns:
True if the other object is overlapping; otherwise, false.

public boolean hasHorizontalOverlap(GameObject other)
Checks whether the object's horizontal positions overlap.

Parameters:
other - The object to check for a horizontal overlap with.
Returns:
True if the other object is overlapping horizontally; otherwise, false.

public boolean hasVerticalOverlap(GameObject other)
Checks whether the object's vertical positions overlap.

Parameters:
other - The object to check for a vertical overlap with.
Returns:
True if the other object is overlapping vertically; otherwise, false.

isCollidingWithPrecise

public boolean isCollidingWithPrecise(GameObject other)
Checks whether the object's positions overlap, while accounting for padding on both objects, causing a collision.

Parameters:
other - The object to check for a precise collision with.
Returns:
True if the other object is overlapping; otherwise, false.

hasHorizontalOverlapPrecise

public boolean hasHorizontalOverlapPrecise(GameObject other)
Checks whether the object's horizontal positions overlap, while accounting for padding on both objects.

Parameters:

Returns:
True if the other object is overlapping horizontally; otherwise, false.

hasVerticalOverlapPrecise

public boolean hasVerticalOverlapPrecise(GameObject other)
Checks whether the object's vertical positions overlap, while accounting for padding on both objects.

Parameters:
other - The object to check for a precise vertical overlap with.
Returns:
True if the other object is overlapping vertically; otherwise, false.
